data.name: Endless Melody: The Symphony of Angels Demo
data.detailed_description:
Story Elements:
Endless Melody is a JRPG with a winding and unpredictable story. It follows several main characters who find themselves tied up in events they can’t escape from. They all struggle with identity to some degree, “who am I?”, “where do I come from?”, “where do I go from here?”

At the core of it though, it is a story about life, love, and acceptance. The characters find themselves in a world after a disastrous event killed millions of people across the land. Set 15 years after, they try to uncover what caused it, and what best to do with that information.

With many new characters, several characters from the fan beloved JRPG “Gaia’s Melody” make a return appearance as playable characters, adding Akira, Zephyre, Doken, and Whyp to the story.

So, I say this: “To those who protect this world, let Gaia’s final battle begin.”

Features:
•A dynamic and fast paced battle system
•Character Skits
•An animal companion
•In-game & Steam Achievements
•Several playable characters all with iatrical arcs
•An actual full length JRPG[/h2][/h2][/h2][/h2]

data.short_description: Follow Fighter; a regular guy who finds himself caught up in world changing events as he learns about friendship, love, and about himself. His sister, Amicia, a young girl with a tragic past searching for the answer to everyone’s big questions: Where do we come from? Where do we go from here?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel I3, AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with 128mb of video ram, dx9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Use an SSD if you can, reduces load times :)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card, 512mb of video ram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Just use an SSD, hard drives are so slow these days.
